description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Enterprise Manager RESTful API. Grafana 7

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("uptime_latest") FROM "vsphere_host_sys" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/ AND "vcenter" =~ /^$vcenter$/ AND "clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "veeamRepositoryName"  fill(none)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity") - mean("veeamRepositoryFreeSpace")) * (100 / mean("veeamRepositoryCapacity"))  FROM  "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE ("veeamRepositoryName" =~ /^$repository$/ AND "veeamVBR" =~ /^$veeamserver$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "System_Up_Time" FROM "win_system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$vboserver$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT 100 - (mean("Percent_Free_Space")) FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$veeamserver$/ ) AND ("instance" !='HarddiskVolume1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance" fill(linear)

panels.title: $veeamserver v$veeamversionM ($veeamversion) - Job Historical Performance and Duration

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_em_overview WITH KEY=host
list.label: Enterprise Manager
list.name: enterprisemanager
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_em_overview WITH KEY=host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_em_job_sessions WITH KEY=veeamVBR
list.label: Veeam Backup Server
list.name: veeamserver
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM veeam_em_job_sessions WITH KEY=veeamVBR

list.definition: select DISTINCT("veeamRepositoryName") from (select "veeamRepositoryCapacity","veeamRepositoryName" from "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)
list.label: Backup Repository
list.name: repository
list.query: select DISTINCT("veeamRepositoryName") from (select "veeamRepositoryCapacity","veeamRepositoryName" from "veeam_em_overview_repositories" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("veeamBackupSessionsName") from (select "veeamBackupSessionsJobResult","veeamBackupSessionsName" from "veeam_em_job_sessions" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)
list.label: Backup Job
list.name: backupjob

list.definition: select DISTINCT("veeamReplicaSessionsName") from (select "veeamReplicaSessionsDuration","veeamReplicaSessionsName" from "veeam_em_job_sessions" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.name: replicajob
list.query: select DISTINCT("veeamReplicaSessionsName") from (select "veeamReplicaSessionsDuration","veeamReplicaSessionsName" from "veeam_em_job_sessions" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.definition: select last("veeamBackupServersVersion") from (select "veeamBackupServersPort","veeamBackupServersVersion" from "veeam_em_backup_servers" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.query: select last("veeamBackupServersVersion") from (select "veeamBackupServersPort","veeamBackupServersVersion" from "veeam_em_backup_servers" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.definition: select last("veeamBackupServersVersionM") from (select "veeamBackupServersPort","veeamBackupServersVersionM" from "veeam_em_backup_servers" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("veeamAgentName") from (select "veeamAgentHostStatus","veeamAgentName" from "veeam_em_agents" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("veeamNASJobName") from (select "veeamNASJobDuration","veeamNASJobName" from "veeam_em_nas_sessions" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)

list.definition: select DISTINCT("veeamBackupSessionsJobType") from (select "veeamBackupSessionsJobResult","veeamBackupSessionsJobType" from "veeam_em_job_sessions" WHERE $timeFilter AND "veeamVBR" =~ /$veeamserver/)
